Lemon Oil
ml
1 lemon
40ml Grapeseed oil Rapeseed oil
  1. If the lemon is waxed, wash and scrub it under boiling water, before drying it off
  2. Zest the lemon, being careful to get none of the white pith
  3. Blend the zest thoroughly with the oil, then pass through a fine sieve
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
